meanings.sent1: Every evening, she ritualized her bedtime routine by reading a story before sleep.
meanings.sent2: The family ritualized Sunday brunch by always going to the same restaurant.
meanings.sent3: He ritualized his morning coffee-making to the point where it became a daily performance.
meanings.sent4: The way she ritualized her morning stretches turned them into a calming dance.
meanings.sent5: The monk ritualized his meditation practice, creating a sense of peace and routine.

meanings.definition: Perform (a ritual) in a prescribed way.
meanings.sent1: During the ceremony, the priest ritualized each step with precision and grace.
meanings.sent2: The team ritualized their pre-game chant to boost morale before every match.
meanings.sent3: The cat ritualized its grooming routine, licking each paw in a specific order.
meanings.sent4: The dancers ritualized their movements, synchronizing perfectly with the music.
meanings.sent5: The chef ritualized the plating of the dish, ensuring each element was placed just right.
